# @nareshkosal/workos-init-script

CLI script to scaffold WorkOS AuthKit files.

## Installation

```bash
# Using npm
npx @nareshkosal/workos-init-script

# Using pnpm
pnpm dlx @nareshkosal/workos-init-script

# Using yarn
yarn dlx @nareshkosal/workos-init-script
```
